title: Wireless Keyboard
description: A sleek, low-profile wireless keyboard with responsive keys and long battery life. Ideal for both office and gaming setups.

title: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
description: Compact earbuds with active noise cancellation and deep bass, perfect for travel, workouts, and daily commutes.

title: LED Desk Lamp
description: An adjustable LED desk lamp with multiple brightness levels and color temperatures. Great for work or reading.

title: Smart Plug
description: WiFi-enabled smart plug that works with Alexa and Google Assistant for seamless home automation.

title: Travel Backpack
description: Durable and water-resistant travel backpack with anti-theft compartments and USB charging port.

title: Ceramic Vase Set
description: A trio of modern ceramic vases perfect for home or office decor. Great for fresh or faux flowers.

title: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip, eco-friendly yoga mat with excellent cushioning for all fitness levels and routines.

title: Hiking Boots
description: Rugged waterproof hiking boots with breathable lining and reinforced soles for all terrains.

title: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with rich stereo sound, deep bass, and 12-hour battery life.

title: Wall Art Print
description: High-quality canvas wall art print that adds a modern touch to your living space or office.

title: Fiction Novel
description: A gripping fiction novel filled with suspense, perfect for weekend reads and book club picks.

title: Children's Puzzle
description: Brightly colored 100-piece puzzle that promotes problem-solving and hand-eye coordination in kids.

title: Winter Jacket
description: Insulated, weather-resistant winter jacket with hood. Ideal for cold and snowy conditions.

title: Screwdriver Set
description: 11-piece magnetic screwdriver set with ergonomic handles and a durable storage case.

title: Camping Lantern
description: Rechargeable LED camping lantern with multiple brightness modes and emergency SOS function.

title: Skincare Serum
description: Anti-aging skincare serum with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C for radiant, hydrated skin.

title: Blender
description: High-speed countertop blender with stainless steel blades, ideal for smoothies, soups, and sauces.

title: Tire Pressure Gauge
description: Digital tire pressure gauge with LED display and auto shut-off for accurate readings.

title: Men's Watch
description: Elegant stainless steel men's wristwatch with date display and water resistance.

title: Laptop Sleeve
description: Padded laptop sleeve with shock absorption and sleek design for 13–15 inch laptops.

title: Smart Thermostat
description: Energy-saving smart thermostat that adapts to your habits and integrates with smart home systems.

title: Electric Toothbrush
description: Rechargeable electric toothbrush with 5 brushing modes and a 2-minute timer.

title: Garden Shears
description: Heavy-duty garden shears with comfort grip handles and sharp blades for effortless trimming.

title: Running Shorts
description: Lightweight, moisture-wicking running shorts with built-in liner and back pocket.

title: Hair Dryer
description: Ionic hair dryer with multiple heat settings and diffuser attachment for frizz-free styling.

title: Coffee Grinder
description: Electric coffee grinder with stainless steel blades for consistent grind every time.

title: Phone Tripod
description: Flexible smartphone tripod with Bluetooth remote and universal phone mount.

title: Car Vacuum
description: Handheld cordless car vacuum with high suction power and multiple nozzle attachments.

title: Desk Organizer
description: Multi-compartment desk organizer to keep pens, notepads, and accessories in order.

title: Throw Blanket
description: Soft fleece throw blanket that adds warmth and style to your couch or bed.

title: LED Strip Lights
description: Color-changing LED strip lights with remote control and adhesive backing for easy setup.

title: Shower Speaker
description: Waterproof Bluetooth shower speaker with suction cup and built-in microphone.

title: Crossbody Bag
description: Compact crossbody bag with adjustable strap and RFID-blocking compartments.

title: Gaming Mouse
description: Ergonomic gaming mouse with programmable buttons and customizable RGB lighting.

title: Notebook Set
description: Set of three lined notebooks with durable covers, ideal for journaling or note-taking.

title: Electric Kettle
description: Fast-boiling electric kettle with auto shut-off and boil-dry protection.

title: Face Cleanser
description: Gentle foaming face cleanser suitable for all skin types, removes makeup and impurities.

title: Wireless Charger
description: 10W wireless charging pad compatible with iPhone, Samsung, and other Qi-enabled devices.

title: Toolbox
description: Sturdy toolbox with removable tray and secure latches for home and garage use.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: Fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, step counter, sleep tracking, and phone notifications.
